query:
SELECT DISTINCT
  e.id,
  e.name,
  e.email,
  e.cargo,
  e.active,
  e.situacao,
  'Nível 2 - RH C&S' as papel
FROM employees e
WHERE e.name LIKE '%Alexsandra%' OR e.email LIKE '%alexsandra%'

UNION

SELECT DISTINCT
  e.id,
  e.name,
  e.email,
  e.cargo,
  e.active,
  e.situacao,
  'Coordenador de Custos' as papel
FROM employees e
WHERE e.name LIKE '%Fernando Pinto%' OR (e.cargo LIKE '%Custo%' AND e.name LIKE '%Fernando%')
